citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 a.m. on
10/30/2014. Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process. An updated itinearary needs to be sent to the eastern
regional office.

narrative:

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 a.m. on
10/30/2014.  Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.  An updated itinearary needs to be sent to the eastern
regional office.
